author: SP9_

text: The music is definitely one of the good things going on for this series. The battle themes are always epic and powerful. Kenji Ito is usually in charge of the music, but Tsuyoshi Sekito made some contributions for this game (like this theme) and he really mimicked Ito's style very well.
author: SupraDarky
